definition: 7 Up (soft drink)/Hedy Holding Co., PRC computer manufacturer
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: Which would you like best, Coke or 7up?
sentences.chinese: 可乐和七喜你喜欢哪种？

sentences.english: Shake and strain into a rocks glass, add 7up, stir.
sentences.chinese: 加冰摇合原料滤入冰过的玻璃杯，注入七喜，搅合。

sentences.english: Sorry, we don't serve 7 up. How about ginger ale, sir?
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我们没有七喜，先生来姜汁汽水怎样？

sentences.english: First pour the Bols Blue in. Second, the Red Bull(half a can) and add seven-up.
sentences.chinese: 首先倒入波士蓝橙，接着倒入红牛，注满七喜。

sentences.english: Mix Vodka And Cointreau with Ice in a shaker and pour into a tall glass. Add the 7-Up to taste.
sentences.chinese: 混合伏特加酒及君度摇荡后入高杯，加入七喜至八分。

sentences.english: Mix vodka and cointreau with ice in a shaker and pour in to a tall glass. add the7-up to taste.
sentences.chinese: 混合伏特加酒及君度摇荡后入高杯，加入七喜至八分。

sentences.english: First pour the Bols Blue in. Second, the Red Bull and last, add seven-up.
sentences.chinese: 首先倒入波士蓝橙，接着倒入红牛，注满七喜。
冰过的七喜，饰以莱姆片。

sentences.english: It is time for the giant to catch up with 7 Up which has its vitamin-enriched versions.
sentences.chinese: 这是巨大的时间赶上七喜有它富含维生素的版本。

sentences.english: This punch was made with pineapples and Seven-up.
sentences.chinese: 这个潘趣酒是由菠萝汁和七喜调成的。

sentences.english: Fresh up with Seven-up, taste that beats the other cold.
sentences.chinese: 君饮七喜，提神醒脑，其它冷饮无法比拟的口味。

definition: Xianchengduo, Chinese brand of orange-flavored soft drink
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
Nestlé Milo milk drink (popular in Hong Kong)
